Name: TypeOfAddress
Description: Indicates address type (i.e. home, office, mailing, etc.). The DDI Alliance has provided a controlled vocabulary (TypeOfAddress) to support this element at http://www.ddialliance.org/controlled-vocabularies.

Name: Line
Description: Number and street including office or suite number. May use multiple lines.

Name: CityPlaceLocal
Description: City, Place, or local area used as part of an address.

Name: StateProvince
Description: A major subnational division such as a state or province used to identify a major region within an address.

Name: GeographicPoint
Description: Geographic coordinate point for the location

Name: TimeZone
Description: Time zone of the location expressed as code. The DDI Alliance has provided a controlled vocabulary (TimeZone) to support this element at http://www.ddialliance.org/controlled-vocabularies.

Name: EffectivePeriod
Description: Clarifies when the identification information is accurate.

Name: Privacy
Description: A basic set of privacy codes for the parent element. These may be stricter than the general access restrictions for the overall metadata. If available codes are insufficient this may also contain any string.

Name: IsPreferred
Description: Set to "true" if this is the preferred location for contacting the organization or individual.
